name: Manastorm Golem
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
immune: acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, thunder
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Amorphous
text: The manastorm golem can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Limited Mutability
text: Any spell or effect that would alter the golem's form only alters it for 1 round. Afterwards, the manastorm golem returns to its humanoid-shaped cloud form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Mystic Messages
text: The manastorm golem can communicate with its maker via magical whispers at a distance up to 120 feet. Only its master hears these messages and can reply. Its messages go through solid objects but are halted by stone, magical silence, a sheet of lead, and similar obstacles. Its voice can travel through keyholes and around corners.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The golem makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a single living creature, the creature is stunned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) force damage.

action.name: Force Bolt
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 25 (4d10 + 3) force damage.
